item.title: Nvidia CEO Pitches Robotics, Cars as Growth Areas to Consumer-Electronics Audience
item.description: Jensen Huang’s address at the CES followed a trading session that sent Nvidia’s value to $3.66 trillion.

item.title: How Uber and Lyft Are Gearing Up for the Robotaxi Revolution
item.description: After ending their own driverless plans, the ride-sharing companies are embracing autonomous-vehicle operators and offering new app features.
